products.name: Avocado
products.description: Creamy and versatile, avocados are a delicious addition to any meal. Packed with healthy fats and nutrients, they're perfect for salads, sandwiches, or simply enjoyed on their own.

products.name: Blueberries
products.description: Sweet and bursting with antioxidants, blueberries are a delightful treat. Add them to your morning cereal, yogurt, or blend them into a refreshing smoothie.

products.name: Eggplant
products.description: Versatile and hearty, eggplants are a staple in Mediterranean cuisine. Whether grilled, roasted, or sautéed, they add depth and flavor to a variety of dishes.

products.name: Carrot
products.description: Crunchy and vibrant, carrots are loaded with beta-carotene and essential nutrients. Enjoy them raw as a snack, or incorporate them into soups, stews, and salads.

products.name: Rosemary
products.description: Fragrant and aromatic, rosemary adds a burst of flavor to any dish. Whether used fresh or dried, it pairs perfectly with roasted meats, potatoes, and vegetables.

products.name: Kiwi
products.description: Juicy and tangy, kiwis are a refreshing tropical fruit rich in vitamin C and antioxidants. Enjoy them sliced on their own, or add them to fruit salads and desserts.

products.name: Eggs
products.description: Versatile and nutritious, eggs are a kitchen staple. Whether scrambled, fried, or boiled, they're a great source of protein and essential nutrients.

products.name: Leek
products.description: Mild and flavorful, leeks add a unique twist to various dishes. Use them in soups, quiches, or sauté them as a delicious side dish.

products.name: Pesto
products.description: Bursting with fresh herbs, garlic, nuts, and cheese, pesto is a vibrant sauce perfect for pasta, sandwiches, or as a flavorful dip.

products.name: Capsicum
products.description: Colorful and crisp, capsicums are a versatile vegetable packed with vitamin C and antioxidants. Enjoy them raw in salads, roasted in the oven, or stuffed with your favorite fillings.

products.name: Mango
products.description: Juicy and tropical, mangoes are a delightful fruit perfect for snacking, smoothies, or adding a burst of flavor to salads and salsas.

products.name: Orange Juice
products.description: Freshly squeezed and full of vitamin C, orange juice is a refreshing way to start your day. Enjoy it on its own or use it as a base for cocktails and smoothies.

products.name: Broccoli
products.description: Nutrient-rich and versatile, broccoli is a powerhouse vegetable. Whether steamed, roasted, or stir-fried, it's a delicious addition to any meal.

products.name: Watermelon
products.description: Juicy and refreshing, watermelon is a summertime favorite. Enjoy it sliced on its own, blended into smoothies, or added to fruit salads for a burst of sweetness.

products.name: Strawberry
products.description: Sweet and succulent, strawberries are a classic favorite. Enjoy them fresh as a snack, sliced on top of cereal, or blended into delicious smoothies and desserts.

products.name: Garlic
products.description: Aromatic and flavorful, garlic adds depth and complexity to a wide range of dishes. Whether minced, sliced, or roasted, it's a kitchen essential for any home cook.

products.name: Honey
products.description: Sweet and golden, honey is a natural sweetener with numerous health benefits. Drizzle it over yogurt, toast, or use it as a glaze for meats and vegetables.

products.name: Hazelnut
products.description: Rich and nutty, hazelnuts add a delightful crunch to both sweet and savory dishes. Enjoy them roasted and chopped in salads, baked goods, or ground into creamy nut butter.

products.name: Tomato
products.description: Juicy and versatile, tomatoes are a kitchen staple. Whether sliced in sandwiches, diced in salads, or cooked into sauces, they add vibrant flavor to countless dishes.

products.name: Pistachio
products.description: Crunchy and slightly sweet, pistachios are a delicious and nutritious snack. Enjoy them on their own, or add them to salads, baked goods, or savory dishes for extra flavor and texture.

products.name: Ginger
products.description: Spicy and aromatic, ginger adds warmth and depth to both sweet and savory dishes. Whether grated into stir-fries, brewed into tea, or used in baking, it's a versatile ingredient with numerous health benefits.

products.name: Coconut
products.description: Rich and tropical, coconut adds a unique flavor and texture to a variety of dishes. Whether shredded in desserts, blended into curries, or enjoyed fresh, it's a versatile ingredient with endless culinary possibilities.
